mean_cn: n. 无政府状态，政治混乱
mean_en: a situation of confusion and wild behavior in which the people in a country, group, organization, etc., are not controlled by rules or laws
sentence: The country was thrown into a state of anarchy.
sentence_trans: 这个国家陷入了无政府状态。
word_etyma: an无 ＋ arch统治者 ＋ y名词后缀 → anarchy无政府状态
